mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie (user_name, movie_name, add_date, movie_comment, movie_eval) VALUES(#{userName}, #{movieName}, #{addDate}, #{movieComment}, #{movieEval})
mapper.update: UPDATE movie SET movie_name = #{movieName}, add_date = #{addDate}, movie_comment = #{movieComment}, movie_eval = #{movieEval} WHERE movie_id = #{movieId}
